item.title: 三星推动 Galaxy 移动设备中的人工智能代理多样化
item.description: 三星电子公司正在与OpenAI公司和Perplexity AI公司等公司洽谈，希望在即将推出的Galaxy设备中集成更多的人工智能服务，寻求在谷歌的Gemini之外提供更广泛的服务。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is in talks with the likes of OpenAI Inc. and Perplexity AI Inc. to integrate more AI services in upcoming Galaxy devices, seeking a wider range of offerings beyond Google’s Gemini.】

item.title: 交易员因美国就业强劲而减少降息押注，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 黄金周五维持跌势，但仍有望实现小幅单周上涨，原因是美国就业数据表现强劲，强化了美联储将在下周维持利率不变的观点。【原文：Gold held a decline on Friday — but remained on track for a small weekly gain — as resilient US jobs data reinforced views that the Federal Reserve will hold interest rates next week.】

item.title: 三星凭借人工智能追赶希望重塑韩国第一股的地位
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd.）至少短暂地重新成为韩国最重要的股票，因为投资者看到了该公司最终在人工智能先进存储芯片领域弥补损失的机会。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. has at least briefly reassumed its place as South Korea’s most important stock, as investors eye chances for it to eventually make up lost ground in advanced memory chips for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 人民币反弹受质疑，部分分析师仍认为年末人民币将走弱
item.description: 分析师说，人民币本周升至八个月高点的涨势可能稍纵即逝，因为经济逆风和美元可能反弹都会阻碍人民币进一步上涨。【原文：The yuan’s rally that took it to an eight-month high this week may prove fleeting as economic headwinds and a potential dollar rebound weigh on further gains, analysts say.】

item.title: 东京通胀放缓，但仍远高于日本央行的目标
item.description: 在选民对高物价的不满导致首相石破茂在周日的大选中历史性地受挫后，东京的生活成本在一些临时因素的影响下连续第二个月下降，即使食品通胀仍然居高不下。【原文：The cost of living in Tokyo cooled for a second month on the back of some temporary factors even as food inflation stayed hot, keeping pressure on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba after voter frustration over high prices led to his historic election setback Sunday.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议乐观，柴油供应紧张，石油保持升势
item.description: 由于在 8 月 1 日最后期限到来之前美国贸易谈判前景乐观，以及柴油市场供应紧张提振了市场情绪，石油价格在创下一周来最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after its biggest gain in a week on optimism over US trade talks ahead of an Aug. 1 deadline, and as tightness in diesel markets boosts sentiment.】

item.title: 美日贸易协定取决于仍是谜团的基金
item.description: 美国和日本本周达成了被美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称为史上最大的贸易协议，此前东京承诺设立一个 5,500 亿美元的基金用于对美投资，但该基金的具体细节仍不清楚。【原文：The US and Japan this week reached what President Donald Trump called the largest trade deal in history after Tokyo pledged to set up a $550 billion fund for investment into the US, details of which remain obscure.】

item.title: 英国储蓄率飙升至 2007 年信贷紧缩以来最高点
item.description: 一项著名的消费者情绪调查显示，谨慎的英国家庭比全球金融危机爆发以来任何时候都更倾向于存钱。【原文：Cautious British households are more inclined to save money than at any point since the run-up to the global financial crisis, according to a prominent survey of consumer sentiment.】

item.title: 华尔街科技股走强，亚洲股市下滑：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市将下跌，与华尔街的涨势背道而驰，因为投资者在美国科技股的强劲收益与关税和利率的不确定性之间寻求平衡。国债下跌，美元走强。【原文：Asian equities were set to fall Friday in a break with gains on Wall Street as investors balanced robust US tech earnings with uncertainty over tariffs and interest rates. Treasuries fell and the dollar strengthened.】

item.title: 华尔街科技股走强，亚洲股市下滑：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者权衡了美联储降息的不确定性，周五亚洲股市将下跌，与华尔街的科技股涨势形成鲜明对比。国债下跌，美元走强。【原文：Asian equities were set to fall Friday in a break with tech-powered gains on Wall Street as investors weighed uncertainty about interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. Treasuries fell and the dollar strengthened.】

item.title: 阿根廷达成国际货币基金组织（IMF）员工协议，释放 20 亿美元资金
item.description: 阿根廷与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）工作人员就该国 200 亿美元计划的首次审查达成协议，这是在 10 月中期选举前对哈维尔-米莱总统投下的信任票。【原文：Argentina reached an agreement with the International Monetary Fund staff on the first review of the country’s $20 billion program, a vote of confidence for President Javier Milei ahead of midterm elections in October.】

item.title: DeepSeek 和特朗普计划引导中国人工智能高级论坛议程
item.description: 本周末，数千名明星创始人、北京官员和财大气粗的金融家齐聚上海，参加中国最重要的人工智能峰会。会议的首要议题是：如何推动中国政府在人工智能领域超越美国的雄心壮志，并从中获利。【原文：Star founders, Beijing officials and deep-pocketed financiers converge on Shanghai by the thousands this weekend to attend China’s most important AI summit. At the top of the agenda: how to propel Beijing’s ambitions to leapfrog the US in artificial intelligence — and profit off that drive.】

item.title: 秘鲁在打击非法采金活动中扣押汞货物
item.description: 秘鲁当局上个月查获了约四公吨从墨西哥运来的汞，亚马逊地区的当局正在努力阻止这种用于非法金矿开采的神经毒素的流通。【原文：Peruvian authorities last month seized about four metric tons of mercury shipped from Mexico as authorities in the Amazon region battle to stem the flow of the neurotoxin used in illegal gold mining.】

item.title: 大举押注港股帮助普鲁士基金超越同行
item.description: 香港股市的回暖为普实投资管理公司（Prusik Investment Management）带来了丰厚的回报，该公司在早期押注了这个金融中心一度不被看好的地产股和企业集团股。首席投资官汤姆-诺顿（Tom Naughton）对未来的进一步收益充满信心。【原文：A revival in Hong Kong stocks has provided bumper returns for Prusik Investment Management, which placed early bets on once-unloved property and conglomerate shares in the financial hub. Chief Investment Officer Tom Naughton is confident that further gains lie ahead.】

item.title: 主权基金 GIC 在交易中使用人工智能 "魔鬼代言人
item.description: 下一次，当银行家向全球最大的主权财富基金之一--新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）提出投资建议时，他们的交易可能会被该公司最新的人工智能工具挑出毛病：虚拟投资委员会和 "魔鬼代言人 "聊天机器人（Agentic Devil's Advocate）会提出棘手的问题。【原文：The next time a banker pitches an investment to GIC Pte, one of the world’s biggest sovereign wealth funds, their deal might get picked apart by its latest AI tools: a Virtual Investment Committee and an “Agentic Devil’s Advocate” chatbot designed to ask tough questions.】

item.title: 金价反弹，纽蒙特削减成本助力盈利增长
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）在控制成本方面取得了进展，在贵金属反弹支撑整个行业之际，帮助这家世界顶级金矿公司实现了超出预期的盈利。【原文：Newmont Corp. has made progress getting its costs under control, helping the world’s top gold miner beat expectations on earnings at a time when a rally for the precious metal is underpinning the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大将养老基金的财务实力作为与美国贸易谈判的筹码

item.title: 彭妮-普利兹克警告特朗普削减开支威胁美国在全球科技竞争中的地位
item.description: 美国前商务部长、哈佛大学强大的管理机构主席彭妮-普利兹克（Penny Pritzker）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统削减科研经费的做法正使美国面临在与包括中国在内的其他国家的技术竞争中败下阵来的风险。【原文：President Donald Trump’s cuts to research funding are putting the US at risk of losing the technological race against other countries including China, said Penny Pritzker, former US commerce secretary and chair of Harvard University’s powerful governing body.】

item.title: 个人电脑需求回升，英特尔发布乐观销售预测

item.title: 澳大利亚小麦前景虽有降雨但改善甚微
item.description: 尽管主要产区降雨量增加，但澳大利亚本季小麦收成仍将减少，这对中国等买家来说是一个打击，因为长期干旱之后，中国可能需要更多进口。【原文：Australia remains on track for a smaller wheat crop this season despite better rainfall in key growing regions, a blow to buyers such as China which may need more imports following a lengthy drought.】

item.title: 为什么 "备忘录股票 "狂热不断？
item.description: 金融市场再次被 "备忘录股票 "狂热所俘获。7 月中旬，在社交媒体的热议和散户投资者突然大举买入的推动下，包括 Opendoor Technologies Inc.、Kohl's Corp. 和 Krispy Kreme Inc.【原文：Financial markets once again have been seized by meme-stock mania. In mid-July, a frenzied rally erupted around a cohort of beaten-down companies, including Opendoor Technologies Inc., Kohl’s Corp. and Krispy Kreme Inc., fueled by a social-media buzz and a sudden surge of buying by retail investors.】

item.title: 谷歌获得 ServiceNow 12 亿美元云合同
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司与软件公司ServiceNow Inc.签署了一项价值超过10亿美元的协议，为其提供云计算服务。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google inked a deal worth more than $1 billion to provide cloud-computing services to software firm ServiceNow Inc., a win for Google Cloud’s efforts to get major enterprises onto its platform.】
